base.title: Base
base.description: The base directory for the project data.

config.title: Config
config.description: The directory in which the config files are. Must be relative to the base directory or an absolute path that exists.

project_schema.title: Project Schema
project_schema.description: The directory in which the schema are. Must be relative to the base directory or an absolute path that exists.

trials.title: Trials
trials.description: The directory in which the individual trials are. Must be relative to the base directory or an absolute path that exists.

per_trial.title: Per Trial
per_trial.description: The directory in which the data are for a given trial. Must be relative to a trial folder, and all trials must share this pattern.

results.title: Results
results.description: The directory in which the results will go. Must be relative to the base directory or an absolute path that exists. Will be created if it is relative to the base directory.

runs_file.title: Runs File
runs_file.description: The path to the runs. Must be relative to the results directory. Default: runs.csv

results_file.title: Results File
results_file.description: The path to the results file. Must be relative to the results directory. Default: results.csv

coldes_file.title: Coldes File
coldes_file.description: The path to which the OriginLab column designation string will be written. Must be relative to the results directory. Default: coldes.txt

diameter.title: Diameter
diameter.description: The common diameter of all rods.

rods.title: Rods
rods.description: Distance of each thermocouple from the cool side of the rod, starting with TC1. Fifth thermocouple may be omitted. Input: inch. Output: meter.

coupons.title: Coupons
coupons.description: Length of the coupon. Input: inch. Output: meter.

refetch_runs.title: Refetch Runs
refetch_runs.description: Fetch the runs from their source files again even if there are no new runs.

records_to_average.title: Records To Average
records_to_average.description: The number of records over which to average in a given trial.

do_plot.title: Do Plot
do_plot.description: Whether to plot the fits of the individual runs.

Group.title: Group
Group.description: The group that this sample belongs to.

Rod.title: Rod
Rod.description: The rod used in this trial.

Coupon.title: Coupon
Coupon.description: The coupon attached to the rod for this trial.

Sample.title: Sample
Sample.description: The sample attached to the coupon in this trial.

Joint.title: Joint
Joint.description: The method used to join parts of the sample in this trial.

good.title: Good
good.description: Whether the boiling curve is good.

PandasDtype.title: PandasDtype
PandasDtype.description: Valid data types for Pandas objects.

OriginLabColdes.title: OriginLabColdes
OriginLabColdes.description:
Valid column designations for plotting in OriginLab.

Designations:
    X: x-axis
    Y: y-axis
    Z: z-axis
    M: x-axis error
    E: y-axis error
    L: Label
    G: Group
    S: Subject
    N: None (Disregard)

Axis.title: Axis
Axis.description: Metadata for a column in the dataframe.

dtype.description: The Pandas data type to be used to represent this column.

units.title: Units
units.description: The units for this column's values.

source.title: Source
source.description: The name of the input column that this column is based off of.

index.title: Index
index.description: Whether this column is to be the index.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Whether this column is informed by the trials config.

originlab_coldes.description: The column designation for plotting in OriginLab.

pretty_name.title: Pretty Name
pretty_name.description: The pretty version of the column name.
